original_title: 악인은 너무 많다 2: 제주 실종사건의 전말
overview: Byung Do, his brother who lives like a scoundrel and was close to detective Kang Pil comes back after being stabbed by 'Submarine' ten years ago. A contractor on Jeju suggests that if there's someone who wants to find someone, one can earn a lot and so, Kang Pil who was financially challenged accepts the requests and heads to Jeju island.  However, there are many suspicious things about the missing director who the contractor wants to find. There was a situation in which he was involved in "win-win manipulation" in the K3 League and even arranged "sex trafficking" for undergraduates in junior soccer classes. And the more they investigate, the more secrets are being revealed...
title: Too Many Villains 2: Missing In Jeju
